title: India, US for giving push to sustainable aviation fuel, hydrogen in buses
description: India and the US have agreed to boost sustainable aviation fuel, promote electrification of medium and heavy-duty vehicles, and use hydrogen in buses and tractors. The agreement was made during the Strategic Clean Energy Partnership dialogue, highlighting investments in clean energy markets and modernising power distribution for reliable energy access.
